thread.title: Stars turn out to recognise our Pride of Britain heroes
thread.title_full: Stars turn out to recognise our Pride of Britain heroes | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Stars turn out to recognise our Pride of Britain heroes
text:
Unsung heroes, charity campaigners and fundraisers have been recognised in this year's Daily Mirror - Pride of Britain Awards.
A galaxy of stars came out in force last night to honour the inspirational people who've made a real difference.
This report by Tom Savvides contains flash photography.
Play video Last updated Tue 29 Sep 2015 Entertainment
